name: PersonStochasticZine
description:
Person Stochastic Zine

Print this on an A3 paper or save as an image. In this zine you will be taken through a short story for a game called Person Stochastic.  The cover page image is generated by using OpenArt AI. 

  • Summary : A team of scientists have created an “entity” with a special ability to change the environment every 10 seconds. You will assume the role of the “entity” , and discover why you were created and what happened after you were created. Your choices will dictate the story. 

This Zine is a small section from my  unity  game. This is the prototype which is still in development.  https://riftenigmastudios.itch.io/personstochastic  password : Goldsmiths.

How to fold a zine page can be found here : https://tallisalevelphoto.weebly.com/zine-making-resources.html
